scripts.nvm: nvm install 14.15 && nvm use 14.15 && nvm alias default 14.15
scripts.gitpod-prepare: npm run nvm && npm run git-shh-to-https && (yes | sudo apt install screen) && (yes | sudo apt install rsync) && (yes | sudo apt install net-tools) && screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.packages-ci: (cd packages && for d in */; do (cd $d && npm ci); done)
scripts.deepcase-build-core: cd packages/deepcase && npm run build && npm run export
scripts.local: cross-env npm_config_yes=true JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://localhost:3006 npm run local-core
scripts.electron-dev: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://localhost:3006 npm run electron-dev-core)
scripts.electron-dev-core: npm ci && npm run deepcase-build && npm run deepcase-electron
scripts.electron-build: (cross-env npm_config_yes=true MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=http://localhost:3007 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0 HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3007 DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=http://localhost:3006 npm run electron-build-core)
scripts.electron-build-core: npm ci && (cd packages/deepcase && npm run electron-build)
scripts.gitpod: export npm_config_yes=true; JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER=https://$(echo $(gp url 3007) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1 HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); export DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); export NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_URL=$(gp url 3006); npm run gitpod-core
scripts.gitpod-core: npm run gitpod-prepare && npm ci && npm run apply-hasura && npm run apply-deeplinks && concurrently "npm run deepcase" "npm run deeplinks" "npm run gitpod-engine"
scripts.gitpod-engine: cd packages/deeplinks && npm run hasura-docker && npx -q wait-on tcp:8080 && sleep 20 && npm run migrate
scripts.git-shh-to-https: git config --global url."https://".insteadOf git:// && git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/
scripts.apply-deeplinks: (rm -rf ./packages/deepcase/app && cd packages/deeplinks && npm run package:build && rm -rf ../deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && rm -rf ../deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && cp -r ./imports ../deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/imports && cp -r ./migrations ../deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/migrations && cp -r ./local ../deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/local && cp ./index.* ../deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/ && cp ./package.json ../deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/deeplinks/package.json && npm run package:unbuild)
scripts.cp-hasura: (cd ./packages/hasura && npm ci && npm run package:build) && cp -r ./packages/hasura/ ./packages/deepcase/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura && cp -r ./packages/hasura/ ./packages/deeplinks/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura && cp -r ./packages/hasura/ ./packages/materialized-path/node_modules/@deep-foundation/hasura && (cd ./packages/hasura && npm run package:unbuild)
scripts.apply-hasura: npm run rm-hasura && npm run cp-hasura
